title: With 'So Much Trouble In The World,' Music Calms Theater Director
teaser: As Center Stage's artistic director, Kwame Kwei-Armah has brought British talent and style to Baltimore. For Tell Me More's series 'In Your Ear,' he shares the music that soothes him.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
